summary: UniXange is a university marketplace app for Jain University students. It is a buy/sell/rent/lost & found platform with Internet Identity login gated to @jainuniversity.ac.in domain, beige + black OLX-inspired theme, profile avatar dropdown, chat feature, professional footer, and item creation modal with ₹ pricing.

existing_features.title: Rebuild the full React frontend for UniXange with all pages: Homepage (hero + category browse + recent listings), Buy Section, Sell Section (authenticated user's listings), Rent Section, Lost & Found Section, Item Detail page, About, Contact, Privacy, and Terms pages.

Implement Internet Identity authentication gated to @jainuniversity.ac.in university email domain, with a login modal showing login/signup views, loading state, and access-denied state for non-Jain University accounts.
Apply a beige and black OLX-inspired visual theme consistently across the entire app, including CSS custom properties, Tailwind config tokens, and component styles.

Implement a profile avatar dropdown in the header that displays the logged-in user's name, email, and university, and provides a logout action. The avatar must be visible and accessible on both desktop and mobile views.

Implement an Add Item modal form that allows authenticated users to post new listings across all categories (buy/sell/rent/lost/found) with fields for title, description (with AI-generated description support), category, condition, price in ₹, image upload, and WhatsApp contact number.
Implement a basic in-app chat feature allowing authenticated users to message each other about listings.
